author: daveremy
msg: Changes to update to JSR 1.0 specification and RI.

author: cezar
msg: - New implementation of DocumentNavigator using XmlCursor.XmlBookmarks for nodes and using only 1 XmlCursor. This improves the performance quite a lot.

author: davidbau
msg: Added a single-argument form of setTimeZone and normalizeTimeZone
utility methods on GDateBuilder.  The single argument is the number
of minutes in the offset, and can be between -840 (-14 hours) and
840 (+14 hours).  This allows you to avoid the clumsiness of setting

author: davidbau
msg: Filling in some of the compiletime abstractions.
(1) input for schema compiles and java compiles (SchemaToJavaInput, JavaToSchemaInput)
is now a "compilable" source set that knows how to produce both metadata and actual
(2) Changed the SimpleDocumentBinding to be indexed by element name and contain the
element's type, rather than vice-versa, and changed the schema binder produce one
(3) Included "Simple" implementations for the basic things passed around at compiletime,
so that the machinery is there to produce complete tylars with .class, .xsb, and
SimpleTylarLoader (for classloader, classpath, and builtin implementations)
